members.name: getCanonicalizationMethod
members.comment: Returns the canonicalization method of this SignedInfo.

members.name: getSignatureMethod
members.comment: Returns the signature method of this SignedInfo.

members.name: getReferences
members.comment: Returns an unmodifiable list of one or more References.

return: an unmodifiable list of one or more References

members.name: getId
members.comment: Returns the optional Id attribute of this SignedInfo.

return: the id (may be null if not specified)

members.name: getCanonicalizedData
members.comment: Returns the canonicalized signed info bytes after a signing or validation operation. This method is useful for debugging.

return: an InputStream containing the canonicalized bytes, or null if this SignedInfo has not been signed or validated yet

name: javax.xml.crypto.dsig.SignedInfo
